titles.title: Tributyltin-Based Antifouling Paint Control Act of 1987
A bill to enact the "Tributyltin-Based Antifouling Paint Control Act of 1987".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 2/2/1987--Introduced. Tributyltin-Based Antifouling Paint Control Act of 1987 - Prohibits the use of paints containing tributyltin as an antifouling paint for painting any vessel if such paints have a steady-state release rate above a certain level. Defines "vessel" as any ship, boat, watercraft, or other marine structure. Establishes civil penalties for violations of this Act.
